text:
Asahi, welcome back.
The live was really great.

Hahaha,
it was so much fun~!

It was funny that Fuyuko-chan and Mei-chan
were wearing the same clothes!

It felt like we were all stirring up
the stage together!

Yeah, when everyone moves,
the audience moves too... and the spotlights follow.

From now on, let's have lots of lives with Straylight,
and stir up the stage!
